text:
Scalia| Software Engineer | London, Paris | INTERNS

Entrepreneur First startup (best/most selective incubator in Europe https://www.joinef.com).

Join a fast growing startup in London or Paris working with the biggest fashion retailers and brands.

We use machine learning to structure and enrich fashion data + Rails/Django to provide a scalable API.

Job offer: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KIBZVvE4q0nBnC9fSWRYjFcr...

contact: matthias@getscalia.com attach your resume/github and a few words about you.
